page.title: 15A Day in the Life of Paul
page.content: In the morning,I wake up at 7.00. We get dressed and go downstairs. At 8.00 I have Frosties for breakfast. At 8.40 we leave to walk to school, then we have some playtime before school starts. At 9.00 the whistle goes twice then we come in and read until assembly time. We do S.M.P.maths until break when we play 'Space Invaders'. You play it like this- somebody throws a ball against a wall so that it rebounds and hits someone else. Who- ever they hit has to do the same. After break,we have our Topic lesson, then we have lunch. I have sandwiches and crisps. Next there is more play- time. After lunch,we see a television programme called 'WATCH' and have a story read to us. When the buzzer goes we get our coats and walk home. I ride my bike until tea and then I build my 'Lego' spaceship. I go to sleep at 8pm
